# The `VPReplicateRecipe` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpreplicaterecipe">VPReplicateRecipe</a> replicates a given instruction producing multiple scalar copies of the original scalar type, one per lane, instead of producing a single copy of widened type for all lanes. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VPReplicateRecipe</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpreplicaterecipe">VPReplicateRecipe</a> replicates a given instruction producing multiple scalar copies of the original scalar type, one per lane, instead of producing a single copy of widened type for all lanes.

If the instruction is known to be uniform only one copy, per lane zero, will be generated.

Definition at line 2780 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplan-h">VPlan.h</a>.

Generate replicas of the desired Ingredient.

Replicas will be generated for all parts and lanes unless a specific part and lane are specified in the <code>State</code>.

### shouldPack() {#af0ce1d62aef3b8e6a79ebe1703f5a7d2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool VPReplicateRecipe::shouldPack () const">
Returns true if the recipe is used by a widened recipe via an intervening <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vppredinstphirecipe">VPPredInstPHIRecipe</a>.

In this case, the scalar values should also be packed in a vector.
